text: Tara pichata te'om yetiya sihamtaka bipadamukta karae tetiya sihamte prthiraita an'yayabharae simalanghana karai thake. He manara! Tomalokara simalanghana kerala tomalokara biraud'dhe'i haya; parthira jiranara sukha upabhoga karai loraa, pichata amara ocarate'i tomalokara pratyarartana. Tetiya ami tomalokaka jana'i dima tomaloke ki karaichila
